summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons (BOP) SENTRY system daily log for August 9, 2019, showing inmate movements, status changes, and administrative actions at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. The log includes numerous entries for inmate 'G0002', who is Jeffrey Epstein, detailing his movements and status changes on the day he died.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The log entries are primarily for inmate 'G0002', which is the inmate register number for Jeffrey Epstein, showing his movements and administrative status changes within the Metropolitan Correctional Center on August 9, 2019.

events.title: Epstein's final day of recorded activity
events.description: The Bureau of Prisons daily log records numerous movements and administrative status changes for inmate Jeffrey Epstein (G0002) throughout the day of August 9, 2019.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York (MCC New York)
keyFacts: This is a Bureau of Prisons SENTRY system daily log for August 9, 2019 - the day Jeffrey Epstein died.
Inmate 'G0002' (Jeffrey Epstein) shows multiple movements and status changes throughout the day, including entries labeled 'BAIL/BOND', 'ADM CHANGE', and 'PRE REMOVE'.
The log records precise timestamps for each administrative action involving Epstein, providing a detailed timeline of his final day in custody.
The document originates from the BOP's SENTRY inmate management system, showing official prison records.
Multiple entries show transfers between different housing units and status changes, indicating Epstein was being moved within the facility on August 9, 2019.
